meta.title: CoachMe Services | Discover a holistic approach to well-being.
meta.desc: CoachMe has a staff of trained professionals with years of experience helping individuals like you achieve success.
meta.keywords: Holistic approach, alternative medicine,  guidance, transformative practices

homeTitle.title: Home
homeTitle.desc: Ready to take the first step towards a happier, more fulfilling life?  Your journey to success starts here!

quoteData.quote: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass...  It's about learning to dance in the rain.
quoteData.author: ~ Vivian Greene

servicesTitle.title: Services
servicesTitle.desc: Our team of coaches are highly trained professionals with years of experience helping individuals like you achieve success.

servicesData.title: Personal Coaching
servicesData.desc: Our certified personal coaches specialize in helping you identify your strengths and develop a personalized roadmap for success.

servicesData.title: Career Coaching
servicesData.desc: Whether you're navigating a career transition, seeking to advance in your current job, or exploring new opportunities, our career coaches are here to help.

servicesData.title: Wellness Coaching
servicesData.desc: Our health and wellness coaches work with you to create sustainable habits, set achievable health goals, and overcome obstacles to living your best life.

aboutData.title: About
aboutData.desc: Discover a holistic approach to well-being with expert guidance, transformative practices, and valuable resources.

whoData.title: Who we are
whoData.desc: At CoachMe, we believe that everyone has the potential to achieve their goals and fulfill their dreams.

whatData.title: What we do
whatData.desc: Our mission is to empower individuals like you to unlock your full potential, overcome obstacles, and thrive in all aspects of life.

unicornData.title: Our unicorn
unicornData.desc: Our coaches took up a similar journey and are here to support you every step of the way.
